ai-tha-ap262:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap262:2.2_0: I came to the supreme city.
ai-tha-ap262:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap262:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap262:4.1_0: In the fifth year of the five twenty-five years,
ai-tha-ap262:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Power.
ai-tha-ap262:7.1_0: was the tenth, the lady of flowers,
ai-tha-ap262:8.1_0: The group of six is finished.
ai-tha-ap262:10.2_0: The seventh section on the Campaka
ai-tha-ap262:10.5_0: And with the verses here combined,
ai-tha-ap262:10.6_0: And all that is the same:
